com.julienviet.pgclient

Interface PgClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SQLClient

    public interface PgClient
extends SQLClient
    The entry point for interacting with a Postgres database.
    Author:
    Julien Viet

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • create

        static PgClient create(Vertx vertx,
                       PgClientOptions options)
        Create a client.
        Parameters:
        vertx - the vertx instance
        options - the client options
        Returns:
        the client

      • connect

        void connect(Handler<AsyncResult<PgConnection>> completionHandler)
        Connects to the database and returns the connection if that succeeds.

        The connection interracts directly with the database is not a proxy, so closing the connection will close the underlying connection to the database.

        Parameters:
        completionHandler - the handler called with the connection or the failure

      • createPool

        PgConnectionPool createPool(PgPoolOptions options)
        Create a connection pool to the database configured with the given options.
        Parameters:
        options - the options for creating the pool
        Returns:
        the connection pool

      • getConnection

        PgClient getConnection(Handler<AsyncResult<SQLConnection>> handler)

        getConnection in interface SQLClient
